sanitizedDescription: Your first basic attack against a champion deals an additional 10 +1 per level damage (6 second cooldown)
description: Your first basic attack against a champion deals an additional 10 +1 per level damage (6 second cooldown)
6121.name: Fresh Blood

description: Killing a unit restores 20 Health (30 second cooldown)

sanitizedDescription: Hitting champions with basic attacks generates a Fervor stack (2 for melee attacks). Stacks of Fervor last 6 seconds (max 8 stacks)and increase your AD by 1-8 for each stack.

sanitizedDescription: Gain up to 5% increased damage over 5 seconds when in combat with enemy Champions
description: Gain up to 5% increased damage over 5 seconds when in combat with enemy Champions
6143.name: Battle Trance

sanitizedDescription: Gain increasingly more Life Steal based on your missing health against champions (up to 20%). Against minions gain 50% benefit (25% for ranged champions).

description: Deal 2% increased damage to champions when no allied champions are nearby

sanitizedDescription: Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take magic damage over 4 seconds. Damage: 8 + 60% Bonus Attack Damage and 25% Ability Power Deathfire Touch's duration is reduced for: - Area of Effect: 2 second duration. - Damage over Time: 1 second duration.

Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take magic damage over 4 seconds.

Damage: 8 + 60% Bonus Attack Damage and 25% Ability Power

Deathfire Touch's duration is reduced for:
- Area of Effect: 2 second duration.
- Damage over Time: 1 second duration.
